name: Loblaw Pharmacy
address: Loblaw Pharmacy, 7190 Kerr St, Vancouver, BC V5S 4W2

featured_reviews.review_id: Like this place! You can find all things hereI absolutely love Loblaw pharmacy! The staff are always so friendly and helpful, and they go above and beyond to make sure I have everything I need. They have a great selection of products, and their prices are always very competitive. I never have to wait long for my prescriptions to be filled, and they are always ready when I need them. Overall, I am extremely satisfied with the service and care I receive at Loblaw pharmacy.

featured_reviews.review_id:
They used to be a lot more accommodating and helpful, but these days they have this attitude of "you're too inconvenient to us, we don't want to help you."

The exact same requests to order medication that's low on stock got denied here - Shoppers next door immediately took the time to order a batch for me. All I got from here was "no, no, no - go somewhere else." Same issue with getting medical supplies, even when I offered to buy a full box of the item, they refused to provide any alternatives.

featured_reviews.review_id: I am a regular customer.  I was very satisfied with the pharmacy's services here.  But yesterday, I feel the pharmacy need some improvement on the services.  During the Covid,  lot of Doctors won't see their patients in person anymore.  Like me, I see my family doctor by phone.  The doctor would fax the prescription to the pharmacy.  However the fax machine is down.  The on duty pharmacist refuse accept the e-mail prescription as an alternative option.  What is the difference between the fax and email?  Why the on duty pharmacist only accept the fax one.  I think this is stupid.  Hope the pharmacy can be more flexible (or at least has an alternative option for the prescription), especially now-a-day most younger people don't even know what Is a fax.  Just want the pharmacy have a better services.  I will give you a better review next time.

featured_reviews.review_id: Suffering from understaffing like all places but doing their best. I checked with their customer service desk 3x for a bag that was droppedin their store and was told it was not there, started the steps of cancelling my bank cards, getting new ID, and towing my car to be rekeyed - only to be phoned 12 hours after it had been dropped off and told it was there the whole time. If you leave something with customer service or hope to find a lost item there, godspeed, it might as well be gone.

featured_reviews.review_id: Just had my Covid booster here and found the staff fast, friendly and professional. They are lacking space to house everything they sell but they always have enough stock to give you what you need.

featured_reviews.review_id: I have been coming to this Pharmacy for many years and have never had a problem.  The staff are always friendly and helpful.

featured_reviews.review_id: Just had flu shot here, Pharmacist Grace was so professional , kind and nice.

featured_reviews.review_id: I've been going to this location for years and have found it to be among the friendliest and most helpful pharmacists.
